title: ​​Like double engine ki sarkar, we will pursue a double engine ka karobar: Rajiv Bajaj reveals company's growth mantra
description: Bajaj Auto's Managing Director, Rajiv Bajaj, revealed the company's dual-pronged strategy for the Indian market, emphasizing approaches for sports bikes, commuter models, and three-wheelers. He criticized the government's high taxation on commuter motorcycles, contrasting India's 28% GST with lower rates abroad. Additionally, Bajaj Auto introduced the highly anticipated Bajaj Pulsar NS 400Z, the most potent and affordable 400cc street-naked motorcycle.
